abstract.t: This document proposes a method for the automatic provisioning ofADSL Customer Premise Equipment (CPE). The term 'automatic' in thiscontext implies that no end-user or customer intervention isrequired to configure and provision the CPE for broadband service.Further, the model suggested by this proposal enables automaticconfiguration of access network equipment utilizing 'flow-through'provisioning techniques already introduced in other standardsbodies.
